quizzes.title: Flutter Basics
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of Flutter fundamentals

options: A UI framework for building cross-platform applications
questions.explanation: Flutter is a UI framework developed by Google for building natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

questions.questionText: Which widget is used to create a scrollable list in Flutter?
questions.explanation: ListView is a scrollable list of widgets arranged linearly.

questions.questionText: What is a Future in Flutter?
options: A widget that displays a future date
A class representing a value or error that will be available at some time in the future
A function that runs in the future
questions.explanation: A Future in Dart (Flutter) is a class representing a value or error that will be available at some time in the future.

questions.questionText: Which package is commonly used for state management in Flutter?
questions.explanation: Provider is a popular package for state management in Flutter.

quizzes.title: Flutter Advanced
quizzes.description: Advanced Flutter concepts and best practices

options: A widget that isolates a portion of the UI
A separate execution thread that runs Dart code concurrently
questions.explanation: A Flutter isolate is a separate execution thread that runs Dart code concurrently, allowing parallel execution without blocking the main thread.

questions.questionText: Which Flutter widget is used for custom painting?
questions.explanation: CustomPaint is a widget that provides a canvas on which to draw during the paint phase.
